AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Advanced Hiveling
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Occasionally, things go better than expected in a Bio-Vat, and a truly exceptional creature emerges. [PAWN_nameDef] is one of these creatures.
